item.description:
Back by popular demand! Come on over for some beading and bitching. Bring a project of your own -those old earrings you now only have one of, the charm you've been wanting to something with or a project you've been needing to work on, but just have not had the time.

If you have beading tools, please bring along as well as any beads or ideas you'd like to share. BYOB

And keep in mind, beading isn't just for jewelry. Think "out of box" curtain tiebacks, hanging light switches, window decor, add a little glamor to clothing or just about any fabric...
item.how_to_find_us: Address will be provided week of event
item.name: Beading & Bitch Girls Night
